clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility, Safety and Effectiveness of Intrathecal Pump Refills at Home: a Pilot Study.

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this pilot study is to evaluate the feasibility, safety and effectiveness of intrathecal pump refill procedures at home. It is our hypothesis that a refill at home will be safe, effectiveness and feasible, as is demonstrated in The Netherlands, and preferred by patients.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient receives intrathecal drug therapy
- Patient is at least 18 years old
- Native French-or Dutch speaking persons.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients < 18 years old.
- No native Dutch or French speaking persons.
